title: Stock market news live updates: Stocks cap losing streak to close higher following comeback rally from earlier sell-off - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: Stocks cap losing streak to close higher following comeback rally from earlier sell-off  Yahoo Finance
description: U.S. stocks closed higher after a comeback rally Friday helped pare some losses from earlier this week as concerns over persistent inflation and the resilience of the U.S. economy stirred up further volatility in recent sessions.
